name: Windows File Gather File from Raw NTFS
author: Danil Bazin <danil.bazin@hsc.fr>
description:
This module gathers a file using the raw NTFS device, bypassing some Windows restrictions
        such as open file with write lock. Because it avoids the usual file locking issues, it can
        be used to retrieve files such as NTDS.dit.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: FILE_PATH
options.description: The FILE_PATH to retreive from the Volume raw device
